content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "append_to_file" command to add a new line of text to "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt". The command returned a response stating that the text was appended successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_new_file.txt", "old_text": "This is a new line of text.", "new_text": "This is a modified line of text.", "occurrence_index": 1}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: Occurrence index 1 is out of range for This is a new line of text. in /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Atlas/executed_code/my_new_file.txt', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is a new line of text.This is another line of text.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "Atlas/executed_code"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "text": "This is a new line of text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "old_text": "This is a new line of text.", "new_text": "This is a modified line of text.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt updated successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
